title: President Donald J. Trump Is Committed to Working with Congress to Solve Our Urgent Immigration Crisis â€“ The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Immigration	

Issued on:
February 5, 2019
There is a humanitarian and security crisis on our southern border that requires urgent action.
						President Donald J. Trump					STOPPING ILLEGAL IMMIGRATION: President Donald J. Trump is committed to working with Congress to build an immigration system that ends illegal immigration and protects our country.THE HUMANITARIAN SITUATION AT OUR BORDER: The unabated flow of illegal immigrants to our southern border has created a humanitarian crisis that needs a solution.URGENT NATIONAL CRISIS: Republicans and Democrats should be able to agree on the need to secure our southern border to protect our citizens and economy.
